data.name: Circuit Superstars DLC: Top Gear Time Attack
data.detailed_description: Take on a different kind of challenge with the special Top Gear Leaderboard – this time using the Circuit Superstars’ recreation of the world-famous Top Gear Test Track! Go up against drivers from a whole range of real-life motorsport series' as well as top eSports stars and see if you can beat them. Race against ghosts of the drivers' actual best laps, and look great while doing so with the special Stig costume!
data.about_the_game: Take on a different kind of challenge with the special Top Gear Leaderboard – this time using the Circuit Superstars’ recreation of the world-famous Top Gear Test Track! Go up against drivers from a whole range of real-life motorsport series' as well as top eSports stars and see if you can beat them. Race against ghosts of the drivers' actual best laps, and look great while doing so with the special Stig costume!
data.short_description: Take on a different kind of challenge with the special Top Gear Leaderboard – this time using the Circuit Superstars’ recreation of the world-famous Top Gear Test Track!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or Windows 10, 64 bit only
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @2.3 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 9.0c compliant
